posts.post_title: FT: Hindu, AB, Miscut for Carolina Brights
posts.post_content: A few on the trading block for a Carolina Brights - depending on card, could be any mix of cards below, could be cash on my end, or am willing to just buy any CBs outright. Thanks! Chris.
